Method Detail

coerceOpenIdScope

public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> coerceOpenIdScope(java.util.List<java.lang.String> scopeValues,
                                                                 java.lang.String defaultScope)
Returns a list of scope values that is ensured to contain defaultScope values without duplications. This can be used when multiple modifications of scope are required to be chained.

Parameters:
scopeValues - scope to coerce.
defaultScope - required default scope, Scope.OPENID if null.
Returns:
list of scope values containing default scope values and scopeValues with no duplications.
